entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bas-Caraquet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bas Caraquet 3:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 47 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -16.4°C
Wind: W 15 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
